greeting.author: jo
greeting.text: Welcome to Spoko App! I'm Jo, your Spoko Assistant. Let's get to know each other!

locationPermissionRequest.author: jo
locationPermissionRequest.text: First of all, can you tell me where you're from?

locationPermissionRequest.author: jo
locationPermissionRequest.text: (Your location will be only used to find cool events around you!)

locationPermissionGranted.author: jo
locationPermissionGranted.text: Great, that's REALLY cool! Now, let's get to know each other even better!

phoneInput.author: jo
phoneInput.text: At Spoko, your privacy is one of our main concerns. This is why the only personal data we ask you for is your phone number.

phoneInput.author: jo
phoneInput.text: It's required for logging into the app and exploring and creating all the fancy games around! :)

verificationCode.author: jo
verificationCode.text: Great, we sent you the verification code! Please enter it below.

phoneVerificationError.author: jo
phoneVerificationError.text: Uh oh! Looks like something went wrong with the number! Please try again.

changePhoneNumber.author: me
changePhoneNumber.text: I'd like to change the number.

changePhoneNumber.author: jo
changePhoneNumber.text: No problem! Please change your phone number and try again.

autoVerification.author: jo
autoVerification.text: Verification code got automatically confirmed! Ready to sign in?

verificationCodeError.author: jo
verificationCodeError.text: Uh oh, looks like the code is not correct. Could you try again?
